pages.text: The resource generator 2 is a block that will duplicate items like cobblestone and stone.$(br2)Any block that can store items can be placed underneath the resource generator 2 including hoppers and chests.$(br2)When working the resource generator 2 will turn blue and start to provide items to the inventory below.
Basic Resource Generator 2 setup. Produces one item every 11 seconds.
Speed blocks can be placed on top to increase the speed blocks are produced.
Pressing U on the resource generator 2 will show all blocks that it can mine as well as any blocks that can effect the speed it produces resources.
